掌.definition: palm of the hand; sole of the foot; paw; horseshoe; to slap; to hold in one's hand; to wield

掌上明珠.definition: lit. a pearl in the palm (idiom); fig. beloved person (esp. daughter)

掌上電腦.definition: handheld computer; PDA (personal digital assistant); Pocket PC

掌中戲.definition: see 布袋戲|布袋戏[bu4 dai4 xi4]

掌勺.definition: to be in charge of the cooking; to be the chef; head cook; chef

掌握.definition: to grasp (often fig.); to control; to seize (initiative, opportunity, destiny); to master; to know well; to understand sth well and know how to use it; fluency

掌摑.definition: to slap (with the palm of the hand)

掌故.definition: anecdote; tales (esp. about a historical figure)

掌權.definition: to wield (political etc) power; be in power

掌燈.definition: to hold a lamp; to light a lamp

掌璽大臣.definition: chancellor (rank in various European states); grand chancellor

掌相.definition: palmistry; features of a palm (in palmistry)

掌骨.definition: metacarpal bone (long bones in the hand and feet)
